name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **PHP**, **Laravel**, and **Symfony** for building scalable and secure backend systems. Expert in designing and implementing **RESTful APIs** and leveraging **Distributed Systems** alongside **Event-Driven Architecture** to optimize application performance. Proficient in **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, implementing effective **Caching Strategies**, and upholding principles of **OOP**, **SOLID**, and common **Design Patterns**. Hands-on experience with **AWS** services including **EC2**, **Lambda**, **SQS**, **Aurora**, and **DynamoDB**. Familiar with monitoring tools like **Datadog** and **Prometheus** to ensure application health and performance. 

Additionally, I have a strong background in developing high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I've implemented microservices architecture and CI/CD automation to maintain compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I also have experience in building machine learning pipelines and implementing **MLOps** workflows with technologies like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
